data.message: I need help, on my main page between my friends list and feed, there is normally a section of birthday peoples, pokes and a news feed that tells me what is trending in the news, i cant find my trending feature it just disappeared , this is one of my favourite features, as it keeps me up today on news

replies.message: Hey Leah. Thanks for reaching out. To help us track this issue, please send us a report through the Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1RH6Vdu. -Anna
